name: Cryo DMG Bonus
description: Increases the Cryo DMG your Characters and Summons deal this Round. (Excluding Swirl DMG)
descriptionraw: Increases the <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K151]</color> your Characters and Summons deal this Round. (Excluding Swirl DMG)
descriptionreplaced: Increases the <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color></color> your Characters and Summons deal this Round. (Excluding Swirl DMG)
